summary: When a young woman comes home from college to her family, mutated alligators start attacking her kin and the rivaling family in the bayou. They must overcome their feuds and fight together against the redneck gators.
cast: Michael Baird|Nicoye Banks|Christopher Berry|Amy Brassette|John Chriss|Danny Cosmo|Shanna Forrestall|Jordan Danger|Matthew James|Isaiah LaBorde|Jimmy Lee Jr.|Ritchie Montgomery|Thomas Francis Murphy|Han Soto|Matt Standley|Victor Webster|Joseph Randy Causin|Abbie Gayle|Darryl Harvey|Nick Killebrew|Shadoe Knight|Laura Jeanne Meyer|Eric Price|Katherine Jeanie Russell|Tony Severio|Shirley Tregre|Jesse Yarborough
title: Caimanes mutantes
